code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Col,Container,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FilterButtons=()=>{const[active,setActive]=useState(null);const buttons=['ALL','BEST SELLERS','ORAL CARE','BODY CARE','SETS','SUBSCRIBE & SAVE'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:true,className:"border-top border-black border-bottom p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mb-0 display-5 p-3 text-center",style:{fontSize:"3rem"},children:"Shop your plastic-free routine."})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center gap-2 flex-wrap my-4",children:buttons.map((label,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>setActive(label),variant:"light",className:"rounded-0 px-3 py-2",style:{border:'1px solid black',backgroundColor:active===label?'#8BF1C9':'white',color:'black',fontWeight:400,transition:'all 0.2s ease'},onMouseEnter:e=>{if(active!==label){e.target.style.backgroundColor='#e7f8f1';}},onMouseLeave:e=>{if(active!==label){e.target.style.backgroundColor='white';}},children:label},idx))})]});};export default FilterButtons;
